name: Zoomforth Inc.
description: Developer of a content experience-building platform intended to help businesses design and customize branded content. The company's platform helps to gather rich media content to support a specific campaign or target a particular audience, as well as deploys online presentations and pages for sales, recruiting, and learning development purposes, enabling clients to create customized websites, track content engagement in real-time and avail valuable insights.
one_liner: Developer of a content experience-building platform intended to help businesses design and customize branded content. The company's platform helps to gather rich media content to support a specific campaign or target a particular audience, as well as deploys online presentations and pages for sales, recruiting, and learning development purposes, enabling clients to create customized websites, track content engagement in real-time and avail valuable insights.
